statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, legal_requirement FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY legal_requirement DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT industry_standard FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE legal_requirement = 'GDPR';
SELECT id, policy_change FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE industry_standard = 'ISO 9001' ORDER BY legal_requirement DESC;
SELECT id, legal_requirement FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, policy_change FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE legal_requirement LIKE '%privacy%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE industry_standard IN ('ISO 14001', 'OSHA') AND legal_requirement IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE industry_standard = 'PCI DSS';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, legal_requirements FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT policy_changes FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM travel_insurance_sector WHERE coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, policy_number, coverage_amount FROM travel_insurance_sector WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT legal_requirements, industry_standards FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE policy_changes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT company_name, coverage_amount FROM travel_insurance_sector WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name FROM travel_insurance_sector WHERE policy_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data r JOIN travel_insurance_sector t ON r.id = t.id;
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, compliance_level FROM legal_requirements WHERE industry_sector = 'Finance';
SELECT standard_name, publication_date FROM industry_standards ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT industry_sector FROM legal_requirements;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements ORDER BY compliance_level DESC, requirement_name ASC;
SELECT requirement_name, industry_sector FROM legal_requirements WHERE industry_sector = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT standard_name, publication_date FROM industry_standards WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT policy_description FROM policy_changes WHERE effective_date < '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements INNER JOIN industry_standards ON legal_requirements.requirement_id = industry_standards.standard_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements;
SELECT requirement, description FROM legal_requirements ORDER BY requirement DESC;
SELECT id, requirement FROM legal_requirements WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM industry_standards WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM travel_insurance_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM policy_changes WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM travel_insurance_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT standard_code, description FROM industry_standards ORDER BY standard_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_requirements WHERE requirement LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM LegalRequirements ORDER BY requirement_name ASC
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM LegalRequirements WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM PolicyChanges WHERE effective_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, standard_name FROM IndustryStandards WHERE compliance_level = 'High'
SELECT company_name FROM TravelInsuranceCompanies WHERE founding_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2010-12-31'
SELECT * FROM LegalRequirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM LegalRequirements WHERE last_updated_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyChanges ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM TravelInsuranceCompanies WHERE founding_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_level FROM IndustryStandards WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
